name: Delay
description: Adds a delay what you can put between Sub-Actions.

fields.fieldDescription: The amount of milliseconds of the delay.
Wheter the delay should be random between the values of `Delay` and `To`.

fieldStates.enabled: Chooses a random value between `Delay` and `To` fields for the delay.
fieldStates.disabled: Uses the `Delay` field for the delay.

fields.fieldDescription: The max amount of milliseconds of the delay, when `Random` is ticked.

fields.fieldContent: You can enter a %variable% in either field, or a number. The value is in milliseconds

name: Get Quote
description: Adds a random or specific quote to the variables.

fields.fieldDescription: Wheter the quote should be random or specific.

fieldOptions.optionDescription: Gets a random quote.
Gets a specific quote by id.

fields.fieldDescription: A specific quote id from your quotes. `Type` needs to be set to Specific.

fields.fieldContent: Adding multiple Get Quotes will overwrite each previous one

name: Get Random Number
description: Adds a random between two values. With `Type`: `Next Float` it picks a random number between 0 and 1 with up to 17 decimal precision.

fields.fieldDescription: Wheter the random number should be Between two values or the Next Float.

fieldOptions.optionDescription: Gets a random quote.
Gets a random number between 0 and 1 with up to 17 decimal precision.

fields.fieldDescription: Your between settings, disabled when `Type` is set to `Next Float`.

fields.fieldContent:
Add a random number into arguments, use percentages, or anything else.

When random type is between, a number between the 2 values you set will be added into the arguments at %randomNumber%

When random type is Next Float, a decimal number (upto 17 decimal precision) will be picked amd added tp the arguments as %randomFloat%, this number will also be added as percentage value (with no decimals) as %randomPercent%

name: Pick Color
description: Convert a specified color to: `HTML Color Code`, `HTML Alpha Color Code`, `OBS ABGR` and the `red`, `green`, `blue` and `alpha` of this color.

fields.fieldDescription: The color you want to convert.
The OBS Color what you can copy, this will be converted from the `Color` field, and this can't be edited.
The variable name that will be prefixed for the color variables.
This will pick a random color each time the action runs, the `Color` field will be disabled.

fieldStates.enabled: A random color will be picked each time the action runs.
fieldStates.disabled: A specified color in the `Color` field will be used for the variables.
